articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Ancient reptile footprints upend theories about when animals evolved to live on land - NBC News
articles.description: Scientists in Australia have identified the oldest known fossil footprints of a reptile-like animal, dated to around 350 million years ago.
articles.content:
Scientists in Australia have identified the oldest known fossil footprints of a reptile-like animal, dated to around 350 million years ago.
The discovery suggests that after the first animals emerge… [+2444 chars]
